author: Zhang, LY

title: Basic Fibroblast Growth Factor Reduces Permeabiliy and Apoptosis of Human Brain Microvascular Endothelial Cells in Response to Oxygen and Glucose Deprivation Followed by Reoxygenation via the Fibroblast Growth Factor Receptor 1 (FGFR1)/ERK Pathway
